<small>Also see: **<big>[[H6239|עֹשֶׁר]]</big>**</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשַׁר‎</span>] **verb** ==be or become rich== (Late Hebrew in derived species, and derivatives; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲתַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***abound with herbage***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***abundance***, of herbage, goods, etc.); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשַׁרְתִּי‎</span> [[Hos.12.9|Hos 12:9]] ***I have become rich; Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶעְשַׁר‎</span> [[Job.15.29|Job 15:29]] ***he shall*** not ***be rich***. — [[1Kgs.22.49|1Kgs 22:49]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשָׂה‎</span> 

**Hiph\`il 1.** ***make rich***, with accusative of person: ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱשַׁרְתִּי‎</span> [[Gen.14.23|Gen 14:23]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱשַׁרְתְּ‎</span> [[Ezek.27.33|Ezek 27:33]] (of personified Tyre; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרֹב הוֺנַיִח‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְשְׁרֶנּוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:61g»§ 61g</sup>),+ accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשֶׁר‎</span>; 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַבַּת תַּעְשְׁרֶנָּהּ‎</span> [[Ps.65.10|Ps 65:10]] ***thou dost greatly enrich it*** (the land); object omitted 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעֲשִׁיר‎</span> [[Prov.10.22|Prov 10:22]], so ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲשִׁיר‎</span> [[1Sam.2.7|1Sam 2:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***maketh rich*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרִישׁ‎</span>). 

**2.** ***gain riches***, absolute: ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲשִׁר‎</span> [[Ps.49.17|Ps 49:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲשִׁיר‎</span> [[Prov.21.7|Prov 21:7]]; [[Dan.11.2|Dan 11:2]] (+ accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשֶׁר‎</span>); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעֲשִׁיר‎</span> [[Prov.10.4|Prov 10:4]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאַעֲשִׁר‎</span> [[Zech.11.5|Zech 11:5]]([[BDB#Gi|Gi]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַאעֲשִׁר‎</span>); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעֲשִׁירוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.27|Jer 5:27]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַעֲשִׁיר‎</span> [[Prov.23.4|Prov 23:4]]; [[Prov.28.20|Prov 28:20]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְעַשֵּׁר‎</span> [[Prov.13.7|Prov 13:7]] ***one enriching himself.***
